pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption:
This video presents a static, eye-level shot of a residential property. The camera remains still throughout the clip, offering a clear view of the scene.

The focal point is a large, two-story brick house with a steep, dark-shingled roof and an arched entryway. A black wrought-iron fence runs across the foreground, enclosing a manicured green lawn and lush landscaping that includes a prominent yucca plant and various shrubs. Palm trees can be seen in the background under an overcast sky.
